Are We Proxy Yet

A curated list of Rust projects that implement HTTP proxy servers

This page lists Rust projects that implement HTTP proxy server functionality. The list is curated and minimal — contributions welcome via pull requests on the repository.

Projects

  • ferron

    A lightweight Rust HTTP proxy implementation and toolkit.

    https://github.com/ferronweb/ferron
  • pingoo

    Rust project that includes proxy capabilities.

    https://github.com/pingooio/pingoo
  • aralez

    An HTTP proxy/server project written in Rust.

    https://github.com/sadoyan/aralez

Want to add a project? Open a pull request on this repo.
